title: If the router I'm using has a VPN, can the router owner see my web activities? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you mean the manufacturer of the router. And the answer is no, they cannot see your web activities. And neither can the ISP you are using see your activities. The website you visit will not know your IP address, but will see the web address provided by the VPN.
Any time you connect to a network that you don’t control, assume everything is monitored and discoverable. There is no way to determine that it isn’t.
